properties.description: A multi use venue run by volunteers for the benefit of the community We have a large safe place for children to run around, we are dog friendly and have a lovely dog on site.
properties.title: Caroline Jane Caldwell

properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 1st November 2023** The Community Café is a warm welcoming space with both lounge and café style seating. The space includes areas to eat, do activities and watch T.V. We serve warm refreshments and food throughout the session and everyone is welcome. There is no charge but we welcome donations.
properties.title: Community Café
